statements: SELECT * FROM feedback_data;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM feedback_data WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT satisfaction_score, customer_id FROM feedback_data ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_feedback FROM feedback_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedback > 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback_data ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC, feedback_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, AVG(satisfaction_score) AS avg_score FROM feedback_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(satisfaction_score) > 3
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM feedback_data WHERE satisfaction_score BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM feedback_data WHERE satisfaction_score < 3
SELECT * FROM feedback_data WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM feedback_data WHERE satisfaction_score = 5)
SELECT * FROM Feedbacks;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM Feedbacks WHERE satisfaction_score > 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM Feedbacks ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Feedbacks WHERE satisfaction_score < 2 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Feedbacks WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM Feedbacks WHERE customer_id = 2 AND satisfaction_score < 4;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM Customers JOIN Feedbacks ON Customers.customer_id = Feedbacks.customer_id WHERE Customers.customer_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_feedbacks FROM Feedbacks;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT feedback_id, satisfaction_score FROM feedback ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC
SELECT * FROM average_scores WHERE calculation_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 124;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_score FROM customers INNER JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE satisfaction_score < 5;
SELECT customer_name, avg_score FROM customers INNER JOIN average_scores ON customers.customer_id = average_scores.average_id ORDER BY avg_score DESC;
SELECT AVG(satisfaction_score) AS average_score FROM feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM feedback_table ORDER BY feedback_date DESC, satisfaction_score ASC
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_score FROM feedback_table WHERE satisfaction_score > 3
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_date FROM feedback_table WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM feedback_table WHERE customer_id = 1234
SELECT feedback_id, satisfaction_score FROM feedback_table ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC
SELECT * FROM feedback_table WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT customer_id, AVG(satisfaction_score) AS avg_score FROM feedback_table GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(satisfaction_score) > 3
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_feedbacks, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM feedback_date) AS month FROM feedback_table GROUP BY EXTRACT(MONTH FROM feedback_date) ORDER BY num_feedbacks DESC
SELECT * FROM feedback_table WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND satisfaction_score BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY feedback_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT MAX(satisfaction_score) AS max_score, MIN(satisfaction_score) AS min_score FROM feedback_table
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, satisfaction_score FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_id, product_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_score FROM customers WHERE satisfaction_score > 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_score DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, product_name, order_date FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, AVG(satisfaction_score) AS average_score FROM customers GROUP BY customer_name HAVING AVG(satisfaction_score) > 4;
